**System Information (please complete all fields):**
 - OS: [e.g. macOS, Windows, Linux]
 - OS Version: [e.g. macOS 14.2, Windows 11]
 - Browser: [e.g. Chrome, Firefox - these are the only officially supported browsers]
 - Browser Version: [e.g. 120.0.6099.109]
 - Extension Version: [e.g. 1.2.3 - find this at chrome://extensions for Chrome or about:addons for Firefox]

**If controls are not appearing, please complete these troubleshooting steps first:**

1. **Check for extension conflicts:**
   - Try disabling all your other extensions except Bandcamp/Discogs Tempo Adjust to see if it works when the others are disabled
   - You can disable extensions by going to `chrome://extensions` (Chrome) or `about:addons` (Firefox) in your URL bar and toggling them off
   - If disabling another extension fixes the issue, please let me know which extension was causing the conflict

2. **Verify permissions:**
   - Click on the Bandcamp/Discogs Tempo Adjust icon in your extensions menu to open the options page
   - This will check if you've accidentally removed any required permissions
   - If prompted, click "Allow" to restore access

3. **Provide browser console output:**
   - If you're still having problems after the above steps, please share your browser console output when visiting a Bandcamp release page
   - **To access the console:**
     - Mac: `Cmd + Option + J`
     - Windows/Linux: `Ctrl + Shift + J`
   - **To share the output:**
     - Right-click in the console and select "Save as..." to download the log file, OR
     - Right-click and select "Copy console" to copy the text
   - Paste the console output or attach the file in a comment below

If you see any errors in the console, please paste the full stack trace here:

